name: Better Dead Than Red
description:
Submission to Wowie Jam 3.0; with the theme of "Failure is progress" -- some of the interpretations include flipping the conditions of winning and losing.

(Putting this just in case)

DISCLAIMER: This is just a simple game meant to explore the idea of flipping winning and losing condition -- in this case, it explores the idea of turning death into the goal. In no way am I advocating for anyone ending their own life via accelerating oneself to high velocity towards the ground using gravity or any other methods.

The game took me around 2 days to brainstorm but only 6 hours to make. I know the quality is not much but I hope you enjoy the game. The idea that seeds the game is simple: make death be the goal; and I kinda needed to brainstorm some ideas to make dying challenging and I came out with the idea of needing a lot of fall damage to die.

Control: Arrow keys

In this version submitted for Wowie Jam, there are 4 stages in total with simple mechanics of falling from high places being the goal.

Btw I think stage 4 is very difficult but I can assure you it's possible; I've tested it.

Really wanted to add some music but... with only ~1hr left by the end I finished all the features and contents I wanted to put into, I just can't; I can't make any music in just 1hr...

P.S.: Ich liebe Jonas Tyroller
